net.sf.mmm.transaction.impl.jpa

Class JpaTransactionExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractLoggableComponent
        • net.sf.mmm.util.event.base.AbstractEventSource<TransactionEvent,TransactionEventListener>
          • net.sf.mmm.transaction.base.AbstractTransactionExecutor
            • net.sf.mmm.transaction.impl.jpa.JpaTransactionExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransactionExecutor, EventSource<TransactionEvent,TransactionEventListener>

    public class JpaTransactionExecutor
extends AbstractTransactionExecutor
    This is the implementation of the TransactionExecutor interface using the JPA (Java Persistence API).
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
